revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Malie Garden |image = [[File:Malie Garden.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Malie Garden. |tokens = 975,000 |location = Northwest of Malie City. }}
<!--T:2--> '''Malie Garden''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 13,483,476 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Alolan Meowth.png|40px]] Alolan Meowth || rowspan=4|<center>[[File:Sightseer (male).png|40px]] Sightseer Mitch ||rowspan=4|<center>[[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck |- | [[File:Poliwhirl.png|40px]] Poliwhirl |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp || rowspan=4|<center>[[File:Preschooler (female).png|40px]] Preschooler Nancy || rowspan=4|<center>[[File:Cleffa.png|40px]] Cleffa |- | [[File:Gyarados.png|40px]] Gyarados |- | [[File:Ledian.png|40px]] Ledian |- | [[File:Ariados.png|40px]] Ariados |- | [[File:Masquerain.png|40px]] Masquerain || rowspan=4|<center>[[File:Sightseer (female).png|40px]] Sightseer Akali ||rowspan=4|<center>[[File:Raichu.png|40px]] Raichu |- | [[File:Basculin (Red-Striped).png|40px]] Basculin (Red-Striped) |- | [[File:Basculin (Blue-Striped).png|40px]] Basculin (Blue-Striped) |- | [[File:Cottonee.png|40px]] Cottonee |- | [[File:Petilil.png|40px]] Petilil || rowspan=4|<center>[[File:Tourist Couple.png|40px]] Tourist Couple Landon and Yukiro || rowspan=4|<center>[[File:Alolan Vulpix.png|40px]] Alolan Vulpix, [[File:Vulpix.png|40px]] Vulpix |- | [[File:Araquanid.png|40px]] Araquanid |- | [[File:Kartana.png|40px]] '''Kartana*''' |- | [[File:Celesteela.png|40px]] '''Celesteela*''' |}
<!--T:6--> '''*Note:''' Must be unlocked by doing [[Quests#Ultra Beast Hunt|Ultra Beast Hunt]] Quest first.
